privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

1. Introduction
Welcome to Taalomy. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. Using our app and website constitutes your acceptance of this policy.

2. Information We Collect
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.
â€¢ Personal Data: Name, email address, phone number, university credentials, and profile image.
â€¢ Financial Data: Payment method details (processed securely by third-party payment processors).
â€¢ Usage Data: Information about how you use our website/app, including access times, pages viewed, and IP address.

3. How We Use Your Information
We use personal information collected via our Services for a variety of business purposes described below:
â€¢ To facilitate account creation and logon process.
â€¢ To send administrative information to you.
â€¢ To fulfill and manage your orders and payments.
â€¢ To protect our Services (e.g., fraud monitoring and prevention).
â€¢ To enforce our terms, conditions, and policies.

4. Disclosure of Your Information
We may process or share your data that we hold based on the following legal basis:
â€¢ Consent: We may process your data if you have given us specific consent to use your personal information for a specific purpose.
â€¢ Legitimate Interests: We may process your data when it is reasonably necessary to achieve our legitimate business interests.
â€¢ Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.

5. Data Security
We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

6. Your Privacy Rights
You have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data. You may also object to processing or request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us at support@taalomy.com.

7. Contact Us
If you have questions or comments about this policy, you may email us at support@taalomy.com or by post to: Taalomy HQ, Cairo, Egypt.

refund_policy.title: Refund Policy
refund_policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

At Taalomy, we strive to ensure a fair and transparent experience for both students and lecturers. Please read our refund policy carefully.

1. General Principle
Taalomy is a platform facilitating connections and payments between students and lecturers. While we do not directly provide the educational content, we facilitate the resolution of disputes regarding payments.

2. Refund Eligibility
Refunds may be considered under the following circumstances:
â€¢ Cancellation by Lecturer: If a lecturer cancels a scheduled session or course, students are entitled to a full refund of the session fee.
â€¢ Technical Failure: If a technical failure on the Taalomy platform prevents the session from taking place, a full refund will be issued.
â€¢ Non-Delivery: If a lecturer fails to attend a scheduled session without prior notice (No-Show), the student is eligible for a refund pending verification.

3. Non-Refundable Scenarios
â€¢ Completed Sessions: Refunds are not issued for sessions that have already taken place and were attended by the student.
â€¢ Student Cancellations (Late): Cancellations made by the student less than 24 hours before the scheduled start time are typically non-refundable to compensate the lecturer for their reserved time.
â€¢ Dissatisfaction with Content: Refunds based solely on personal dissatisfaction with the lecturer's teaching style or content quality are subject to review and are generally not granted unless there is a clear violation of our terms.

4. Refund Process
To request a refund, please contact our support team at support@taalomy.com within 48 hours of the incident. Include your transaction ID, session details, and a brief explanation. Approved refunds will be processed back to the original payment method within 5-10 business days.

exchange_policy.title: Exchange Policy
exchange_policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

1. Scope
As Taalomy deals primarily with digital bookings and educational services, the traditional concept of exchanging physical goods does not apply.

2. Rescheduling as Exchange
We recognize that plans change. Users may request to 'exchange' a booked time slot for another time slot with the same lecturer, subject to the following conditions:
â€¢ Availability: The desired new time slot must be available in the lecturer's schedule.
â€¢ Notice Period: Requests for rescheduling must be made at least 24 hours in advance of the original session time.
â€¢ Lecturer Approval: Some rescheduling requests may require direct approval from the lecturer.

3. Course Transfers
In cases where a student has purchased a package or term-long course, transferring enrollment to a different course by the same lecturer may be possible upon request and is subject to price adjustments if applicable.

4. Contact
For assistance with rescheduling or course transfers, please use the in-app support tools or contact support@taalomy.com.

shipping_policy.title: Shipping Policy
shipping_policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

1. Digital Services Only
Taalomy is a strictly digital platform providing Educational Technology services. We do not sell, ship, or deliver physical products (such as textbooks, hardware, or merchandise) to user addresses.

2. No Shipping Fees
Since there are no physical goods, there are absolutely no shipping fees, handling charges, or delivery surcharges associated with the use of our platform.

3. Address Information
Any address information collected during registration or checkout is used solely for billing verification, tax compliance, and identity validation purposes.

delivery_policy.title: Delivery Policy
delivery_policy.content:
Last Updated: January 1, 2025

1. Method of Delivery
All services and content purchased through Taalomy are delivered electronically via the internet. 

2. Timing of Delivery
â€¢ Account Access: Access to your user account is immediate upon successful registration and email verification.
â€¢ Premium Features: Access to paid features or subscriptions is granted immediately upon confirmation of successful payment.
â€¢ Live Sessions: Access links to live video sessions or classrooms are made available 10-15 minutes prior to the scheduled start time.
â€¢ Recorded Content: If applicable, recorded lectures or materials are accessible immediately after purchase or as released by the lecturer.

3. Delivery Failures
If you do not receive access to a purchased service immediately (typically within 15 minutes of payment), please check your email spam folder for confirmation details or check your internet connection. If the issue persists, contact us immediately at support@taalomy.com with your transaction details for prompt resolution.
